changelog.title: PenTest+ PT0-002 Toolkit
changelog.description: CompTIA PenTest+ reference covering all 5 exam domains: planning, recon, exploitation, reporting, and tools.

changelog.title: Comprehensive Attack Reference
changelog.description: OWASP Top 10, SQL injection, XSS, privilege escalation techniques for Windows and Linux.

changelog.title: Pentest Frameworks
changelog.description: PTES, OSSTMM, NIST 800-115, MITRE ATT&CK, and Cyber Kill Chain methodologies.

changelog.title: Tool Command Reference
changelog.description: Nmap, Burp Suite, SQLMap, Metasploit, Hydra, Aircrack-ng with real command examples.
